main_definition: Something that is relevant, suitable, or able to be used in a particular situation or context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relevant or applicable to a specific situation or topic
meanings_and_examples.example: The advice given by the professor was not applicable to my personal circumstances.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fit for use, suitable for a particular purpose or job
meanings_and_examples.example: These safety guidelines are applicable only if you're working with hazardous materials.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Easily understood and able to be used in various situations
meanings_and_examples.example: The rules of this game are applicable regardless of the level of expertise of the players involved.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Capable of being carried out or enforced, especially in legal contexts
meanings_and_examples.example: These terms and conditions are legally applicable to all users who sign up for our service.
